Bonobo.Irc.IrcChannelRepresents model of IRC channel object. Keeps messages channel information and has usefull methods
Bonobo.Irc.IrcChannelConversationRepresents channel IRC conversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConnectionClass that handles network connection for IRC library. It receives messages through TCP protocol and parses them into IrcMessage and send IrcMessage via TCP
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConnectionInfoThis class represents information about user and IRC server to connect
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConnectionReceiveBufferClass is used to read and parse IRC messages from network
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConnectionStateEventArgsRepresents arguments that are given to IrcConnection state changed event
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConversationRepresents basic IRC conversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConversationMessageRepresents message in IrcConversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcConversationServerMessageMessage received from server that belongs to server conversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcMessageClass represents IRC message. It is used to parse messages received from server and it's object representation of message
Bonobo.Irc.IrcMessageEventArgsRepresents arguments on messsage received by IrcConnection
Bonobo.Irc.IrcMessageFactoryProtocol class that returns object representation of IRC message
Bonobo.Irc.IrcPersonRepresents boject representation of user client
Bonobo.Irc.IrcPersonConversationRepresents person IRC conversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcServerConversationRepresents server IRC conversation
Bonobo.Irc.IrcSessionClass that represents main interface for client communication. Represents server connection and commands that are available and pertains to server
Bonobo.Irc.IrcStateChangedEventArgsRepresents arguments on session state change
